'''[[Delusional Ideas SD-124|Delusional Ideas]] :'''' Alterations in the content of thought leading to a loss of contact with reality, not shared by the socio-cultural group.

'''[[Hallucinations SD-122|Hallucinations]]:''' Sensory perception without the presence of a detectable object.

question.question: Which of the following best describes hallucinations?
question.option_a: A loss of contact with reality due to alterations in the content of thought
question.option_b: A sensory perception that occurs in the absence of a detectable object
question.option_c: A belief that is not shared by the socio-cultural group
question.option_d: A temporary state of confusion often caused by medication
